main.name: Hello, I'm Fatan Aminullah
main.bio: My name is Fatan Aminullah, i'm a 20 years old Software Developer. Now i'm working at PT. Emporia Digital as a Frontend Developer. I'm using ReactJS to build a Web Application and React Native to build a Mobile Application. I started my journey as a Professional Programmer in 2019, but I've started introducing myself to programming since I was in junior high school
main.contactMessage: Want to discuss something? Feel free to contact me!

projects.title: IKI Bills Dashboard
projects.description: IKI Bills Dashboard is a Dashboard page for iki bill administrator. Iki Bills is a system to pay your estate management bills.

projects.title: IKI Aku
projects.description: IKI Aku is an application to ease you to transfers your money to all banks in Indonesia safely. Transaction can be done anytime, anywhere. With a strong partnership with local banks in Taiwan, IKI Aku provides remittance service for foreign workers to send money to their relatives in Indonesia.

projects.title: IKI Mitra
projects.description: IKI Mitra is an electronic platform and business solution for Warung, BPR, Cooperatives, BUMDES, and Communities which we refer to as 'Mitra IKI'. IKI Mitra facilitates its users to do business and earn promising income with 4 business pillars: PPOB, Bank Transfer, Remittance and P2P Landing. IKI Mitra mobile apps created with react native
